verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Many a time<WH7227> have they afflicted<WH6887> me from my youth<WH5271> up<WH3478>, Let Israel now say<WH559>,
Many a time<WH7227> have they afflicted<WH6887> me from my youth<WH5271> up<WH3201>: Yet they have not prevailed against me.
The plowers<WH2790> plowed<WH2790> upon my back<WH1354>; They made long<WH748> their furrows<WH4618>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is righteous<WH6662>: He hath cut asunder<WH7112> the cords<WH5688> of the wicked<WH7563>.
Let them be put to shame<WH954> and turned<WH5472> backward<WH268>, All they that hate<WH8130> Zion<WH6726>.
Let them be as the grass<WH2682> upon the housetops<WH1406>, Which withereth<WH3001> before<WH6927> it groweth up<WH8025>;
Wherewith the reaper<WH7114> filleth<WH4390> not his hand<WH3709>, Nor he that bindeth sheaves<WH6014> his bosom<WH2683>.
Neither do they that go by<WH5674> say<WH559>, The blessing<WH1293> of Jehovah<WH3068> be upon you<WH1288>; We bless you in the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
